page.title: 12EAST YELLAND POWER STATION
page.content: Although not situated within our grid area the Power Station will soon become a major social concern because it is due to be demolished. The Power Station was commissioned in the mid 1950's and was coal fired. It has been in "mothballs" since the late seventies and has now been superceded by other more modern stations. The concern surrounds the large amounts of asbestos built into the station. Residents in our grid area are obviously worried about the health risk. Assurances have been given that safety standards will be stringent. Our local skyline will certainly look different without the high power station chimneys.
